group_1.textLeft: So this is Yukuni.
It really feels like we are on vacation.

group_1.textRight: While I'm tempted to say you have no sense of@danger...
this *is* a hot springs area.
If you head out towards the mountains,@you will find many hot spring inns.

group_1.textLeft: I did some research beforehand.
I read that this is a luxurious town nestled between@the sea and the mountains.

group_1.textRight: It will take some time, but you can go to the harbor.
There are ferries that you can take to other countries,@which explains all the foot traffic here.

group_1.textLeft: Sasha, your father was a sailor, I believe?

group_1.textRight: Yep, he met Mama at the harbor and got married,@ehehe♪

group_1.textLeft: I didn't ask for that much...
For such a small town, it is quite packed.

group_1.textRight: The only tiny problem is how cloudy it is most days.
Anyways, Lady Nayuta,@what is your course of action for today?

group_1.textLeft: I picked a few places where Papa may have went,
so today, we will be visiting the folklore museum.

group_1.textRight: I wasn't aware of a folklore museum in Yukuni.
Mmm...
Oh, I got a result from searching♪
Characteristic sights at Yukuni's hot springs,@about geothermal cooking...
It sounds like it's introducing traditional events@that use Yukuni's climate.
If you know the location,@I think I could give directions,
so please specify where it is, Lady Nayuta.

group_1.textLeft: Very well.
Oh, but before that, I would like to ask one thing:
Rabi, Sasha, did you meet Papa in Yukuni?

group_1.textRight: ...Indeed, I did.@He saved me from a dilemma,
and he showed me a way to save Magical Girls.
He mentioned he was going to put it all in a book@someday,
so he could be writing it right now, somewhere.

group_1.textLeft: (I'm positive that must mean he wants@to let the world know of us.)
(It seems he helped Rabi and Sasha as well,)
(so him giving up on saving Magical Girls@clearly must have been a mistake...)

group_1.textRight: Is everything alright?

group_1.textLeft: I was just thanking Papa for saving you and Sasha.
Because of him, I have you helping me so much@every day, Rabi.

group_1.textRight: Is that so.

group_1.textLeft: So as a sign of my appreciation,@I will purchase some souvenirs for you.

group_1.textRight: Souvenirs from Yukuni for someone from Yukuni...?

group_1.textLeft: That is true...
[chara:103301:effect_ef_adv_01][chara:103701:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]This is...?

group_1.textRight: A Witch's signature. Let's go defeat it.
Unlike Kamihama, we cannot manifest Doppels here,
so please be careful.

group_1.textLeft: Certainly.

group_1.textRight: Stop, do not jump!

group_1.textLeft: Sasha, put her to sleep with your harp!
Lady Nayuta and I will defeat the Witch!

group_1.textRight: Please leave it to me!

group_1.textLeft: Understood!
